name: STARSYSTEM Compound Intelligence Ecosystem
description: A comprehensive ecosystem of interconnected MCP servers and libraries that enable compound intelligence through systematic thinking, knowledge management, and cognitive architectures.

Core Framework & Intelligence.description: Foundational systems that provide the base infrastructure and intelligence capabilities for the entire STARSYSTEM ecosystem.

Core Libraries.description: Essential libraries providing specialized functionality for systematic thinking, data modeling, and discovery workflows.

STARSYSTEM Navigation & Knowledge.description: Systems for project navigation, knowledge management, and compound intelligence orchestration within the STARSYSTEM.

Meta & Development Systems.description: High-level orchestration and development tools for working with the entire STARSYSTEM ecosystem and MCP development.
